issues.message: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast?application=axeAPI)

runnerExtras.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
